hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path of #gold#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #a Gold Skulltula Token# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Piece of the Triforce#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# has #3# major items.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Right Central Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Deku Shield#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Lake Hylia# is on the path of #gold#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that deep in the #wasteland a spider and a chest# hold...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of the Triforce#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Trail# has #2# major items.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: Did you know that you can access the Fire Temple boss door without dropping the pillar by using the Hover boots?

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Piece of the Triforce# and #a Piece of Heart#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #the Boomerang# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that a #pool of lava# in Goron City blocks the way to a pool guarded by a #Tektite#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #a Shadow Temple Small Key# can be found at #Lon Lon Ranch#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that winning the #treasure chest game# rewards #a Piece of Heart#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Recovery Heart#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Castle# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #storm near the castle# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Ice Cavern Push Block Room Red Rupee 3

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Huge Rupee# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of the Triforce#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the path of #gold#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# hoards #a Bomb Bag#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that something wonderful happens when playing the Song of Storms after planting a magic bean.
